item.casualtinker.molten_dragon_gold_buc: Molten Dragon Pattern Black Gold Bucket
material.casualtinker.tea.flavor: A mysterious material from the Orient
material.casualtinker.tea.description: A mysterious material from the Orient
material.casualtinker.phoenix_gold.flavo: Immortal gold bathed in Phoenix blood
material.casualtinker.phoenix_gold.descr: Immortal gold bathed in Phoenix blood
material.casualtinker.dragon_gold.flavor: Immortal gold bearing golden dragon patterns
material.casualtinker.dragon_gold.descri: Immortal gold bearing golden dragon patterns
advancement.casualtinker.root.desc:
A Tinkers' Construct 3 addon.
Added randomly based on my sudden inspirations.
Discover the secrets of Gu worms.
advancement.casualtinker.persist.desc:
Accumulate 5 hours of playtime in this world.
(Reward: Perseverance Immortal Gu)
advancement.casualtinker.attitude: Attitude is the Mask of the Heart
advancement.casualtinker.attitude.desc:
Kill any mob while invisible.
(Reward: Attitude Immortal Gu)
advancement.casualtinker.wisdom_sword.de:
Manually kill a Master-level villager.
(Reward: Wisdom Sword Immortal Gu)
advancement.casualtinker.spring_autumn.d:
Trigger a Totem of Undying (or Spring Autumn Success) 5 times.
(Reward: Spring Autumn Cicada)
modifier.casualtinker.rude.description: Deals +996 damage to entities with exactly 20 max health
modifier.casualtinker.teabright.descript: 50% chance on hit to apply Glowing for 2s to entities within 10 blocks
modifier.casualtinker.all_out.flavor: Go all out, win in one strike
modifier.casualtinker.all_out.descriptio: Chance to trigger a critical hit (jump attack) when attacking. Higher levels increase chance
modifier.casualtinker.phoenix_repair.des: Equipment/tools repair themselves while in lava or fire. Higher levels repair faster
modifier.casualtinker.phoenix_blessing.d: Grants Fire Resistance and Regeneration while in lava or fire. Higher levels heal faster
modifier.casualtinker.dragon_prestige.de:
40% chance on hit to release pressure, damaging (based on your max HP) and knocking back nearby enemies every 5s.
Damage scales inversely with enemy HP
Cooldown: 60s
modifier.casualtinker.reverse_scale.desc: When taking over 10 damage in a single hit and surviving, instantly heal 2 HP (per level) and gain Strength II and Resistance II briefly.
modifier.casualtinker.dragon_tooth.descr: On attack, there is a 50% chance to inflict the Shattered Dragon effect on the target, reducing their armor. Level 1 ignores 10% armor, increasing by 10% per level (lasts 3 seconds).
modifier.casualtinker.haruhikage.flavor: Light gathers in silence, waiting for the moment to bloom.
modifier.casualtinker.haruhikage.descrip:
Holding this weapon for 5 seconds without attacking puts it into a 'Charged' state (indicated by particles).
The next attack deals massive bonus damage and highlights the target.
Current Multiplier:
Level 1: 1.5x Damage
Level 2: 1.65x Damage
Level 3: 1.8x Damage
Level 4: 2.0x Damage
modifier.casualtinker.hitoshizuku.descri:
Synergy with [Haruhikage]:
Increases damage based on Haruhikage trigger count.
Damage increases by 1% for every 2 triggers (Max 400%).
modifier.casualtinker.mygo.flavor: Even if lost, run forward with all your might.
modifier.casualtinker.mygo.description:
Triggered when taking over 20% max HP damage in a single hit:
Grants Speed II, Resistance II, and Regeneration I for 5 seconds.
Cooldown: 20 seconds.
modifier.casualtinker.idea_mushroom.desc: The tool gains the [Unbreakable] attribute and will never consume durability.
modifier.casualtinker.river_amulet.descr: Reflects all projectiles and grants immunity to projectile damage
modifier.casualtinker.river_amulet.flavo: Destiny decided in twenty-seven steps, I roam freely upon the Reverse Flow River
modifier.casualtinker.thrifty.descriptio: 40% chance to return ammo when firing ranged weapons
modifier.casualtinker.finger_sword.descr: Sneak + Right Click consumes 20% durability to deal 20% True Damage to the target
modifier.casualtinker.finger_sword.flavo: After fifty-four tribulations, the clouds still shroud the heavens
modifier.casualtinker.familiar.descripti:
Reduces your presence.
Mob detection range reduced by 50%.
modifier.casualtinker.time_success.descr:
Prevents death on fatal damage if:
1. Player Level >= 100 (Consumes 100 levels)
2. Armor is not broken
3. Skill not on cooldown (10 min)
Grants 5 min Bad Luck after triggering.
modifier.casualtinker.time_success.flavo: Cold winds blow in Desolate Valley, the cicada cries, the youth returns
book.casualtinker.page1:
§1§lIdler's Manual

§0This is a guide book.

Author: Woh6k


Contents:
- Core Content
- Immortal Gu Modifiers
- More to come...
book.casualtinker.page2:
§1§lCore Content

§n§1Material Acquisition§r

Primordial Stone Ore can be mined in the Overworld near bedrock (below -30). (Affected by Fortune)
Mining drops Primordial Stones, which can be right-clicked to obtain materials
book.casualtinker.page3:
§1§lImmortal Gu Modifiers

§n§1Perseverance Immortal Gu§r

Obtained by unlocking the achievement for 5 hours online time

Modifier: Reverse Flow Seal

Slot: Chestplate
Type: Defense
Effect:
Reflects all projectiles using the Reverse Flow River water and grants projectile immunity.
book.casualtinker.page4:
§n§1Attitude Immortal Gu§r

Obtained by unlocking the achievement for killing a mob while invisible

Modifier: Familiarity

Slot: Helmet
Type: Defense
Effect:
Reduces the detection range of hostile mobs by 50%.
book.casualtinker.page5:
§n§1Wisdom Sword Immortal Gu§r

Obtained by unlocking the achievement for manually killing a Master-level villager

Modifier: Five Finger Heart Sword

Slot: Melee Weapon
Type: Upgrade
Effect:
Sneak + Right Click at a target consumes 20% weapon durability to deal 20% damage that ignores Armor and Magic Resistance. Range: 20 blocks
book.casualtinker.page6:
§n§1Spring Autumn Cicada§r

Obtained by unlocking the achievement for triggering Totem of Undying or Spring Autumn Success 5 times

Modifier: Spring Autumn Success

Slot: Chestplate
Type: Ability
Effect:
Consumes 100 levels to prevent death once. Enters a 10-minute cooldown and applies 5 minutes of Bad Luck
